topic: Relevance of the internship for leave of absence
question:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I am a student of computer science and need the statement on the relevance of my voluntary internship (at BMW Group) for the leave of absence in the winter semester 2024/25. I need the document by November 15, 2024. Could you please tell me how I can get this document or who I should contact?

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,"
answer:
Hello,

To receive a statement from the academic advisor, please send us the documents listed at cit.tum.de/cit/tipps-informatik -> Industrial internships so that we can check whether such a statement can be issued.

Kind regards
